page.title: 01The Area We Surveyed.
page.content:
The area we surveyed included the eastern side of{Hereford}around{Eign {Hill.}This is mainly the residential area known as{Tupsley.
To the south of this is the{Rotherwas area with its{ancient monument}and more recent{industrial estate.
In the eastern parts of our area is the village of{Hampton Bishop},an old village which has had a constant battle against flooding.
The{River Lugg}and The{River Wye flow through the area .
Much of the area is agricultural, with some mixed farms and a substantial amount of rough grazing.
